uws.service.actions

Class ListJobs

  • java.lang.Object
    • uws.service.actions.UWSAction
      • uws.service.actions.ListJobs
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ListJobs
extends UWSAction

    The "List Jobs" action of a UWS.

    Note: The corresponding name is UWSAction.LIST_JOBS.

    This action returns the list of jobs contained in the jobs list specified by the URL of the request. This list is serialized by the UWSSerializer choosed in function of the HTTP Accept header.

    Version:
    4.1 (04/2015)
    Author:
    Grégory Mantelet (CDS;ARI)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • match

        public boolean match(UWSUrl urlInterpreter,
            JobOwner user,
            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
              throws UWSException
        Checks whether:
        • a job list name is specified in the given UWS URL (note: the existence of the jobs list is not checked),
        • the UWS URL does not make a reference to a job (so: no job ID),
        • the HTTP method is HTTP-GET.
        Specified by:
        match in class UWSAction
        Parameters:
        urlInterpreter - The UWS URL of the given request.
        user - The user who has sent the given request.
        request - The received request.
        Returns:
        true if the given request corresponds to this UWS action, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        UWSException - If any error occurs during the tests.
        See Also:
        UWSAction.match(UWSUrl, JobOwner, HttpServletRequest)

      • apply

        public boolean apply(UWSUrl urlInterpreter,
            JobOwner user,
            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
              throws UWSException,
                     java.io.IOException
        Gets the specified jobs list (and throw an error if not found), chooses the serializer and write the serialization of the jobs list in the given response.
        Specified by:
        apply in class UWSAction
        Parameters:
        urlInterpreter - The UWS URL of the given request.
        user - The user who has sent the given request.
        request - The received request.
        response - The response of the given request (MUST BE UPDATED).
        Returns:
        true if the actions has been successfully applied, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        UWSException - If any error occurs during the action application.
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error while the result is written in the given response.
        See Also:
        UWSAction.getJobsList(UWSUrl), UWSService.getSerializer(String), SerializableUWSObject.serialize(ServletOutputStream, UWSSerializer, JobOwner), UWSAction.apply(UWSUrl, JobOwner, HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse)
